definition: dean/mullah/imam (Islam)/see also 伊瑪目|伊玛目[yi1 ma3 mu4]

sentences.english: Djelloul Seddiki, the director of the Al Ghazali imam training program at the Paris mosque agrees.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎清真寺的教長培訓項目主管塞迪奇同意這種觀點。

sentences.english: He supported the patriarch, he conciliated the greeks.
sentences.chinese: 他支持大教長，他綏撫希臘人。

definition: Bismarck (name)/Otto von Bismarck (1815-1898), Prussian politician, Minister-President of Prussia 1862-1873, Chancellor of Germany 1871-1890
to whisper to one another's ear
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation

lit. to assess the head and discuss the feet (idiom); minute criticism of a woman's appearance/fig. to find fault in minor details/to remark upon a person's appearance/nitpicking/overcritical/judgmental
to take refuge in religious life
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
white face/face painting in Beijing opera etc
men and women should not touch hands when they give or receive things (citation, from Mencius)
